Package edu.pdx.cs410J.grader

Class Survey

java.lang.Object
edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.EmailSender
edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.Survey
public class Survey
extends EmailSender
This program presents a survey that all students in CS410J should answer. It emails the results of the survey to the TA and emails a receipt back to the student.
